definition: pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs

sentences.english: Even the railroads seem only scratched in with a penknife.
sentences.chinese: 甚至鐵路似乎也只是用鉛筆刀隨意刮出來的。

sentences.english: My pencil is blunt—can I use your sharpener?
sentences.chinese: 我的鉛筆鈍了，能用你的鉛筆刀嗎？

sentences.english: A:Find me a penknife, can you, please?
sentences.chinese: 幫我找一把鉛筆刀可以嗎？

sentences.english: I'd like a red pencil and a pencil-sharpener.
sentences.chinese: 我想買一支紅色鉛筆和一個鉛筆刀。

sentences.english: He forced the lock with a penknife.
sentences.chinese: 他用一把鉛筆刀撬開鎖。

sentences.english: They took my belt , my penknife and my watch .
sentences.chinese: 他們拿走了我的皮帶，鉛筆刀和手錶。

sentences.english: Excuse me, how much is the red pencil sharpener?
sentences.chinese: 打擾一下，這個紅色的鉛筆刀多少錢？

sentences.english: Could I have a look at the sharpener on the right?
sentences.chinese: 我可以看看右邊的那個鉛筆刀嗎？
